name: Snake and Sproutling
description:
Change is a part of life. Change is necessary. Change is good. Unless you’re a Corn Snake who just emerged from its newly shed skin to find your entire world looks completely different. Now, it’s up to you and your new friend Sproutling to team up, fight enemies, and save your garden in this action platformer.

"Snake and Sproutling" was made for the Buddy Up Game Jam by Team Corn Gang.

Controls:

WASD - Move 

Space - Jump

X - Vine attack

UP (Arrow key) - Vine wall 

DOWN (Arrow key) - Drop/Pickup Sproutling

Credits:

Writer - Leah Morris - https://twitter.com/Ravynlea

Artist and Animator - Charlotte Pang - https://www.instagram.com/franjipang/

Artist and Animator - Ibyss - https://twitter.com/Eribyss

Game Designer - Martin Garcia - https://twitter.com/martingnp

Created in Unity with Runia Dev's Dialogue Editor.
